topic.title: Please sort by upvotes
topic.body: Please add a sort by # of upvotes.

topic.title: Play (zero site) looks intriguing. How do I download torrents anonymously?
topic.body:
Play: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1PLAYgDQboKojowD3kwdb3CtWmWaokXvfp/
This says it's impossible to use torrents over TOR because the clients are not designed well: https://blog.torproject.org/blog/bittorrent-over-tor-isnt-good-idea

topic.title: What does this mean? "This site requests permission: Merger:ZeroMe"
topic.body: I tried to view ZeroMe site and it kept asking me that question in a notification.

8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: Please fix WebGL in Chrome. "Rats! WebGL hit a snag."

11_1CMjV2r4EBpFt8VCcWWZKDysZXPcPExRNN.body:
RetroShare has all the green checks across except for one.
https://www.eff.org/node/82654
Telegram has a mode with all green checks.

2_1J7dTw3ZsXUsXzpBqVWVj5aXRUMsMC6Nfc.body: Telegram has a secret mode that passes the EFF scorecard. https://www.eff.org/node/82654

1_1DUt2hdvamdyX1LtRC6YqoyUPRqGEJGdYY.body:
> [yee](#comment_2_1LrJ9rZg2Mk2uK8MyPx42iWPEHTLKXzxVn): I disagree, police are good people, it's just the minority that make them seem bad. Also, the police are there to enforce the law. You should be blaming the politicians and multi-billion dollar companies that are pushing for the internet to be censored.

Any cop who doesn't arrest a dirty cop is just as dirty. They do deserve hate, but I wish it was focused on the known murderers instead of random ones. Why don't terrorists believe in due process?

4_1HDGK4rrMzuouF8hNnxfMNpWyR8qAtP4HR.body: Even the constitution is not permanent, but at least it requires 2/3rds majority instead of 1/2.

1_1Kb4wAfZMYYdzW1Bng8uaVJtSLQXMdCsAB.body:
> [ks](#comment_149_14TDWFVHuTXNcg8pp6LRr7v9ZcfbFsMSyx): Why don't you just post them here (or on your zite)?And btw, how can memes be rare?

Rare memes is a meme. (Rare Pepe's.)

1_19RagxAc2n7zYdfbfda2Zc4dRoHRJzyAxo.body: Just make all content cost to post. It covers both ads, content, and product placements. Then only worthwhile content is posted and the content that makes the best use of the space rises to the top according to the coase theorem. You don't get spam in your post box do you? Make all post cost a penny or less and only quality things will be posted.

> [bon](#comment_14_1CZhapKybCk4VkGiSso1YzXZd1oG5C3oAw): So only people with money are allowed to contribute? Flawed and abuse-able

Yes. People with money have shown themselves to be contributing and productive members of society. That should earn them the right to speak out. No one wants to hear from spammers and crazy homeless people.

1_1Dj5WCaPV2r18QcDQFHmyx2HnGmwMJce9b.body: Yeah but who pays for the energy generation or distribution and system maintenance? No free lunch! Life's not fair! Go live in Venezuela if you really feel that way.

1_12ammmMtU2utLCtNGwLwrh3K8LsmzR4k8T.body: I think you have to move or delete the ZeroBundle\ZeroNet\data directory. Then you can make a new one. If you want the old one back, restore the directory. There might be a more elegant way. Stop ZeroNet if you decide to change the directory.

2_1AZjDLkfYwSmjM7ZJUf7HHnrF778augRMa.body: Is there any way to stop criminals from using the internet? I recently saw a post on Reddit asking about rape stories.

5_17VwZEfWSUWb5RHkK9m1odnDdBfvjTL6Cp.body: Maybe you should pay them? Opportunity costs, yo.

1_1JGTZxxkeZuhNBRfW6imTjeYbzjgqkU48N.body:
There is a really great channel that explores the Fermi paradox in great depth. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=94iDdHRa2X4
(I hope that is the right video & channel. I'm currently blocking YouTube.)
Anyways, the best answer that most people who've studied the Fermi paradox are that we are the first, or tied for first, at least within the observable universe. It seems quite unlikely, but it's the only logical conclusion. There might be illogical conclusions which might be interesting, but probably not.

1_1MwJSNBC1savftEvXQyoHcVLDgThtAPr6T.body: Don't donate lump sums. Donate small amounts monthly, like $100/m, then judge progress over time and adjust accordingly.

1_1HJugahAiT2RnwJQdHuEd2RgW5fpWwNxnB.body:
